about_the_game:
The Game

VHS Collection: Goodnight Me is a spine-chilling, atmospheric horror game that takes players on a disturbing journey over the course of five harrowing days. Set in a remote house where the lines between reality and nightmare blur, this game plunges you into a world of eerie visuals and psychological terror.

You play as a lone protagonist who returns home to what should be a peaceful, solitary life. But as the days progress, strange and unexplainable events begin to unfold. It starts subtly—a bizarre TV broadcast showing something it shouldn’t, dreams that feel too real, and objects in your home that move on their own. Each night brings a new nightmare, each day a deeper descent into madness.

On the first night, a seemingly innocent episode of a TV show turns into something horrifying, sparking a chain of increasingly disturbing events. As the days go by, your sense of reality unravels. The protagonist’s dreams become darker, haunted by visions of ominous forests, unsettling mazes, and cryptic symbols. His waking life isn’t safe either—he encounters strange noises, glimpses of a creature lurking in the shadows, and even a haunting memory from his childhood that he thought was long buried.

Aesthetic

The game’s VHS-inspired aesthetic enhances the sense of disorientation, with visuals that flicker and distort as the protagonist’s mental state deteriorates. As you piece together the mystery.

Features

  • VHS Style
  • Chat with Npc's
  • Dark Atmosphere

In Short

VHS Collection: Goodnight Me is more than just a game it’s an experience that will linger in your mind long after you’ve finished playing. Can you survive the nightmare, or will you succumb to the madness?

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 2500 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 / AMD Radeon HD 8750M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 4200U / AMD A8-5545M
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560
